prHeadline: IRD Introduces AI-Enabled CVSA Decal Reader for Commercial Vehicle Operations
headlineTxt: Jun 28, 2021, 06:30 ETIRD Introduces AI-Enabled CVSA Decal Reader for Commercial Vehicle Operations(TSX: QTRH) (OTCQX: QTRHF), is pleased to announce the launch of a new CVSA decal reader system that utilizes Artificial Intelligence (AI) and machine vision technology. AI enables superior read rates of CVSA decals and makes IRD's CVSA decal reader ideal for automatic pre-screening of commercial vehiclesMore news about: International Road Dynamics
